DOC.brief_summary: Aim study : To evaluate effect shorten version Incredible Years ( IY ) Basic programme , study parent recruit . A randomising experimental control between-group design use pre- post-intervention measurement , one-year , four-year ten-year follow-up . Children family randomize either shorten basic version ( n = 89 ) , control group ( n = 97 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Shortened Version Incredible Years ( IY ) Basic Programme Non-clinical Community Sample
DOC.criteria: No diagnosable behavior problem child Diagnosable behavior problem child
